Redruth combines with Camborne to form the largest conurbation in Cornwall.
The town also has a long history of Tin mining.

value: address=Bridge, Illogan, Nr. Redruth, Cornwall TR16 4QP

content=Rayle Farm self-catering holiday cottages are set in the heart of beautiful western Cornwall. The traditional farm buildings have been sensitively converted by local craftsmen and are perfect for relaxing short breaks or longer family holidays. Each cottage rental accommodates between two and six people and dogs are welcome.
